Bus to Arusha is 6-10 hours, TSh11,000/=.  Direct bus leaves at 6am; others originate in Singida.  Bus to Singida is 2 hours, TSh7,000/=, originates in Arusha.  Through buses will probably not have seats (you will have to stand).
